QuestData.Title: Ruinous Rituals
QuestData.Description:
Take a look in the city square, $c.
<Marshal Reade gestures toward a ritual being performed by some disciples in the distance.>
It appears the coven has gone beyond dark constructs, and are now conjuring creatures of nightmare with their rituals. Let us not wait to see what these monsters are capable of. We should put an end to them right here.
Fortunately, the disciples seem too focused on their spell to notice us. Maybe you can use that to your advantage.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Blighted Horrors in Upper Corlain.
QuestData.RewardText: I am glad we were able to stop those things here, before the coven could unleash them on Drustvar's unsuspecting citizens.
